DGEVSCode.engine.description:
Which Friday Night Funkin' Engine Lua Script API will this extension autocomplete.
Requires Restart/Reload to take effect.

DGEVSCode.data.description: Path to the local folder containing all of the API Data for the different engines.

DGEVSCode.onlineDataURL.description: URL path to the online folder which contains all of the API Data for the different engines.

DGEVSCode.enableOnlyOnCertainScripts.description: If checked, this extension will only work if a Lua script contains '---@funkinScript' comment

DGEVSCode.eventDocumentationGeneration.description: If checked, after entering a event function, placeholder arguments are inserted on top of the function

DGEVSCode.functionArgumentsGeneration.description: If checked, after entering a call function, default values of arguments are inserted inside of the function

DGEVSCode.offlineMode.description: If checked, the completion data will no longer update with the online iteration
